title: world icons 2017
body: I know few days back there were those bundles to buy the icons and world emote, they showed the "[TAG]" of the team when in game if im not wrong, if now you buy the regular icons in the store that cost 250rp it will still give you the team tag name?

replies.body: I do believe those tags still show up from those icons, but you do need to make sure it's equipped first.
